title: CUSTOM TRAINING GAME MODE
body:
Hey All,

Was just thinking it would be very awsome if there was a training custom game mode with no cooldown aswell as unlimited gold to play around with skills and and items. At the moment we have to actually farm in a custom game to buy what we need, also waiting for your ability to come back every time can be daunting.

replies.body: I believe what you mean is, sandbox mode.
And I'm Pretty sure Riot said they would never release a sandbox mode :(
They did recently go back on that.

Any reason as to why they would never reslease it? i mean come on its just a custom game nothing bad comes out of it.
